item.title: How i Use Notion with Bug Bounty and Pentesting Books
item.description: Introduction Hello Guys!👋 In This Article, I will Explain How I use Notion effectively for Taking Notes, Summarising and Reviewing Books for Bug Bounty, and other Pentesting Notes or Books. So first of all we will use a notion’s function called “Table” or “Database” and It’s like what u imagine, Columns and Rows and within it, we can make a library. So without further a do let’s start! 😀 Making Table Open Notion and make a new page by clicking the “Add a page” Button on the left side.
